name: LeapSheep
description:
This game is what we ( joselor and ventilateur ) made for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam.  

Quick presentation of LeapSheep

It's a game where you play as a cute little sheep and have to escape as fast as you can the big bad wolf that tries to catch you. To do that, you'll jump and roll to be as fast as you can and uncover the secrets of this game.

Unfortunately, like many other jam games, we definitely didn't have enough time to make everything we wanted with the game, so keep in mind this game is really short.

Controls

Left and right arrow to move around. Spacebar to jump. Down arrow to roll. Keep in mind you can jump while rolling.
